text: V치r is a goddess of promises and agreements in Norse mythology. She listens to people that make agreements with one another. She also punishes those that break their promises and contracts. V치r is described in the Poetic Edda and the Prose Edda. The contracts that V치r makes are called varar. Her name means 'pledge' or 'beloved'. Category:Norse gods and goddesses
title: V치r
